attacks.name: Adornment
attacks.effect: For each of your Benched Pokémon, search your deck for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: G-Max Whisk
attacks.effect: Discard any amount of Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.
